net.objectzoo.ebc.adapters

Class EventToEvent0<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.objectzoo.ebc.adapters.EventToEvent0<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The Event's parameter type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.objectzoo.events.Event0

    public class EventToEvent0<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements net.objectzoo.events.Event0
    Adapts an Event to provide the Event0 interface. The implementations just adapts all subscribed Action0 instances with the Action0ToAction adapter.
    Author:
    tilmann
